snippet: Billy Hunter, the chief of the N.B.A. players union since 1996, will not be at a meeting to defend himself, but he is vigorously contesting allegations of nepotism and questionable business practices.
abstract: NBA players' union is expected to fire executive director Billy Hunter, whose 16-year stewardship has come to grief amid accusations of nepotism and wide range of questionable business practices.
lead_paragraph: Billy Hunter, the chief of the N.B.A. players union since 1996, will not be at a meeting to defend himself, but he is vigorously contesting allegations of nepotism and questionable business practices.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Union Is Expected to Fire Hunter
headline.main: Still Fighting, Union Chief Is Likely to Take One on Chin
headline.print_headline: Still Fighting, Union Chief Is Likely to Take One on Chin
